I still haven't been able to install Cantera but I admit that in this days =
I've been quite 
busy=85
As I've said before there is no `setup.m' script i=
n the Cantera/matlab folder but looking 
better I've seen an error in the p=
ython building procedure that occurs just before the 
Matlab building proce=
dure: it seems that a wrong  `=96arch i386' is issued to the g++ 
compiler =
just before the correct `-arch ppc' and this generates a lot of errors=85
